mapper.sql: select u.DATA_ID, u.DATA_CODE, u.DATA_NAME, u.DELFLAG, u.DATA_REMARK, u.CRE_NAME, u.CREATOR, to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD') CRE_TIME, u.STATE from PROJECT_DATA_DICTIONARY u
mapper.select: select count(0) cnt FROM PROJECT_DATA_DICTIONARY u
mapper.insert: insert into PROJECT_DATA_DICTIONARY( DATA_ID, DATA_CODE, DATA_NAME, DATA_REMARK, CRE_NAME, CREATOR, CRE_TIME, STATE )values( #{DATA_ID}, #{DATA_CODE}, #{DATA_NAME}, #{DATA_REMARK}, #{CRE_NAME}, #{CREATOR}, sysdate, #{STATE} )
mapper.update: update PROJECT_DATA_DICTIONARY set DATA_CODE = #{DATA_CODE} , DATA_NAME = #{DATA_NAME} , DATA_REMARK = #{DATA_REMARK} , STATE = #{STATE} where DATA_ID = #{DATA_ID}
mapper.select: select u.DATA_ID, u.DATA_CODE, u.DATA_NAME, u.DELFLAG, u.DATA_REMARK, u.CRE_NAME, u.CREATOR, to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD') CRE_TIME, u.STATE from PROJECT_DATA_DICTIONARY u where u.DATA_ID = #{DATA_ID}
mapper.sql: select u.DATA_DTL_ID, u.DATA_ID, u.DATA_DTL_CODE, u.DATA_DTL_NAME, u.PAR_DATA_DTL_ID, u.PAR_DATA_DTL_CODE, u.PAR_DATA_DTL_NAME, u.DATA_DTL_DES_1, u.DATA_DTL_DES_2, u.REMARK, u.DELFLAG from PROJECT_DATA_DICTIONARY_DTL u
mapper.insert: insert into PROJECT_DATA_DICTIONARY_DTL( DATA_DTL_ID, DATA_ID, PAR_DATA_DTL_ID, PAR_DATA_DTL_NAME, DATA_DTL_NAME, DATA_DTL_CODE, PAR_DATA_DTL_CODE, DATA_DTL_DES_1, DATA_DTL_DES_2, REMARK, DELFLAG )values( #{DATA_DTL_ID}, #{DATA_ID}, #{PAR_DATA_DTL_ID}, #{PAR_DATA_DTL_NAME}, #{DATA_DTL_NAME}, #{DATA_DTL_CODE}, #{PAR_DATA_DTL_CODE}, #{DATA_DTL_DES_1}, #{DATA_DTL_DES_2}, #{REMARK}, 0 )
mapper.delete: update PROJECT_DATA_DICTIONARY_DTL set DELFLAG = #{DEL_FLAG} where DATA_DTL_ID in ($DATA_DTL_IDS$)
